home.hero-sub: Everything you need to know about me

intro.title: About Me
intro.content: I am a Computer Science Master student, focusing on Game Development. I love coding and trying new technologies. I love games and designing games.

techstack.title: My Tech Stack
techstack.content:
Software and API:
  Game: Unity3D, Unreal
  Frontend: React, Bootstrap, MUI, MERN Stack

Programming Languages:
  C#, C++, Python, javascript, HTML, CSS, etc.

hobby.title: My Hobby
hobby.content: In addition, I also love modeling. I can use modeling software such as Zbrush, Maya, as well as Substance Painter, Substance Designeer, Photoshop and other software to create textures.
